summary: After 400 BC, a new philosophy was born in South east Asia, generated from the ideas of Buddha, a mysterious Prince from Nepal who gained enlightenment while he sat under a large, shapely fig tree.
cast: Richard Gere|Blair Brown|The Dalai Lama|Mark Epstein|Jane Hirshfield|William Stanley Merwin|D. Max Moerman|Robert Thurman|Kevin Trainor
title: The Buddha
